lines: 1. Ruoth Yesu, nithona,koro aheri;Kuom tekoni nawerichona duto;In ma Jawar mang`won,rembi nochwerna;Koro, Yesu Ruodha,aheri adier.
2. Aheri nikechnihera mokwongo;Niting`o richonae yadh Kalwari;Nichandori malitnikech richona;Koro, Yesu Ruodha,aheri adier.
3. Anaheri pilenyaka chieng` thona;Anapaki pileka pod angima;Ka ngimana norum,to pod nawachni,Koro Yesu Ruodha,aheri adier.
4. Eka kwadak kodie dala Nyasaye,E piny Ruoth manyiennonadendi pile.Kosidhna osimbonapaki kawer;Koro, Yesu Ruodha,aheri adier.
